item.description:
Greeting Fellow Volunteers,

Looking for a fun new way to volunteer? Help seniors, children and people with disabilities get healthy exercise and feel welcome and included at dozens of fun community salsa events this summer and beyond!

Side benefit: Learn to dance salsa (or improve your moves if you already know how) and meet lots of great people who care about helping their communities!

This Meetup is a "Volunteer Training"

(so that we are all ready to hit the ground running next Monday!!)

This meetup focuses on preparing volunteers for the best ways to help during the actual Salsa in the Park event.  We will walk through the space, learn where everything is, how to set up, etc.  We offer a different type of meetup on Thursdays, May 30, June 6 & 13 to learn some salsa, and to help children, seniors people who are blind or deaf, and people with other types of disabilities or barriers to participation.

The 1st actual event is Monday, June 10th.  Set-up begins at 4pm, and Clean-up ends at 9:30 pm. We need help throughout the evening, but the most important times are at the beginning and end!

When & Where:

Monday, June 3, 5:30-7pm

The Home of Salsa in the Park

Blackstone Community Center Courtyard (and auditorium)

On the corner of Washington & W Brookline Streets in the South End.  (near Stella's & the Salvation Army)

Schedule of Meet-up:

5:30-5:45 pm Meet the directors and other volunteers that you will be working with to make this amazing event possible!

5:45-6:45 pm Take a tour of the area we use for the event, and learn the many ways you can help.  You will also be able to see videos of past events, to get an idea of how everything will work. At the end there will be time for Q & A with program staff.

6:45-7 pm Meet-up/Training wraps up, and you can sign up for volunteer shifts for June 10th and other upcoming events.

Can't make it this week, but still want to volunteer?


Just contact us at 888 982 6382 or at info@metamovements.com, and we'll let you know about other ways to get involved.

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org


Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the courtyard, right in front of the building. If you are late or it is raining, just come inside and ask for "Salsa" at the desk. We'll provide a cell # for your convenience :)

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Learn to how to help at "Salsa in the Park"...and get ready for next Monday!
